data.message: Smh.  Eminem really fell off, in my opinion.  I miss that raw Shit that was in his older shit.  It seems like he just trying to rap fast now, but it ain't no good

replies.message:
It is an international capital crime to bear false witness against Eminem.
Enjoy your afterlife in hell!!!
Lmao.  I bear no false witness! I speaketh the truth! The dopeness hath left that man!
I feel you.  Yeah, I think the sobriety really ruined it for me lol
Eminem knows that too ahah but he's off that shit

Eminem plays a syllable game. Nobody rhymes like him. He isnt trying to get points across anymore. he focuses on what rhymes best what hes gonna rhyme that nobody else can rhyme, he'll make a word rhyme with a sentence. and I hate when people compare him to tupac. Eminem is a better rapper by his standards but tupac was getting a message across that changed a lot of mind sets for people. the only hing they have in common is that they came from the gutter.
His shit was dope when he was fucked off... No junk, no soul
Yes Dave Stanton people do grow up then they get old and die
